ComicInfo.Summary: Ryan Archer returns to Earth with his Micronauts companions to find his world locked in a massive war with the forces of Baron Karza. Steve Kurth of KARZA joins the series as new penciller! The invasion of Earth is already well underway, as the Micronauts discover first-hand when they arrive in the middle of a massive aerial battle. Things quickly go from bad to worse as Baron Karza launches his plan of global enslavement and genocide-and the winged fighter called Red Falcon zeroes in on the 'Nauts to deal some personal damage. It's a lousy day to be human, in "Welcome to Earth."
ComicInfo.Title: Welcome to Earth
